name: A.L.O.N.E.
description:
You find yourself stranded in a deserted city. all on your own. You eventually stumble upon a robot named A.L.O.N.E., who is also... well... alone. He wants your help to find a place full of life after being buried in sand for who knows how much time.

Screenshots Featuring... A.L.O.N.E.

A lonely and maybe a bit obnoxious robot that's been buried in sand for potentially decades. All he remembers is his name, how to talk, and what it was like before his village got abandoned. He doesn't like change and wants to go back to how it was before he was buried.

Acronym

A rtificial, 

L onely,

O bnoxious, and

N eurological

E ntity

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Mouse - Look

Left Mouse Button - Interact With UI

Credits Development / Art
